name: ghiraldi-base-user
description: The ghiraldi user plugin is part of the ghiraldi base package of plugins. It provides the generalized concept of a user, which can be built upon to provide a robust user type.
readme:
ghiraldi-base-user
========================

The ghiraldi user plugin is part of the ghiraldi base package of plugins. It provides the generalized concept of a user, which can be built upon to provide a robust user type.
